body: Data representation, digital logic, instruction set/control logic, machine/ assembly languages, advanced architectures, memory hierarchy, I/O devices, overall system design.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC121 or equivalent)(Additional Attributes: NONE)
